desc: BrilliantPad is the first automatic, self-cleaning dog potty. Train your puppy or your small dog to use BrilliantPad so them have the freedom to go potty when they need to. Because BrilliantPad automatically wraps & seals waste so your home will be odor-free and there will be no clean-up for you.

layout.text: ALWAYS A CLEAN SPOT TO GO
BRILLIANT PAD: PET HEALTH & HAPPINESS, ALL ROLLED INTO ONE
